delete-account.title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

description.p1: Initially, the account will be deactivated and you will be able to reactivate it within 30 days.
description.p2: After this period, the account will be permanently deleted.

username.p1: If you want to change username, you can do so here!
username.label: Username
username.error: The username must be: min 3 characters, max 20 characters and no special characters.
